subject: Labor and Jobs
Baseball
lead_paragraph: About 400 people, including former major leaguers, gathered at N.Y.U.’s Tishman Auditorium to recount Marvin Miller’s influence as baseball’s powerful union leader.
snippet: About 400 people, including former major leaguers, gathered at N.Y.U.’s Tishman Auditorium to recount Marvin Miller’s influence as baseball’s powerful union leader.
